name: addDevice
shortDescription: Pairs a device without enabling pairing mode
description: This method pairs a device by its serial number, but this does not work for all devices.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the device to be paired

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: ID of the family you want to add the device to; if not specified, "addDevice" is executed for all device families that support it.

returnValue: Returns the device description of the newly paired device if the pairing was successful
